context: 2. Aspirin 81 mg p.o. q. day. 3. Lisinopril 20 mg p.o. q. day. 4. Metoprolol 50 mg p.o. b.i.d. 5. Niacin OTC 100 mg p.o. b.i.d. 6. He is now on IV diltiazem as well.
